CustomField.description: If checked, the Task Completion Percentage % will be calculated based on the completion of checklist items with the percentage complete calculated as the number of checklist items completed compared to the total number of checklist items.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If checked, the Task Completion Percentage % will be calculated based on the completion of checklist items with the percentage complete calculated as the number of checklist items completed compared to the total number of checklist items.
CustomField.label: Enable Task Completion from Checklists
